name: Sourcerer
description:
Play as a Roso – a young sorcerer, who just discovered his powers. In order to achieve full control over his magic abilities, he decided to find the Source of Tranquility, which by his believes will help him to attune with himself. On his journey he will face dangerous enemies and deadly traps.

Help him get controls of his powers!

Controls:

Move left or right with left or right arrow buttons. 

Jump with Z or arrow Up.

Use a spell with X.

RollCreators team:

Developer – Vyacheslav Zhuravlev

2D Artists – Andrey Elisafenko , Anna Bespalova

Animations by Andrey Elisafenko 

Game Design by Egor Savenko
